meanings.sent1: The cookie was the crumbliest treat at the party.
meanings.sent2: The crumbliest cake I've ever tasted was at the bakery.
meanings.sent3: She loved the crumbliest cookies because they reminded her of her grandma's baking.
meanings.sent4: The crumbliest sandcastle on the beach was washed away by the tide.
meanings.sent5: The crumbliest pastry melted in my mouth with each bite.

meanings.sent1: The crumbliest muffin left a trail of crumbs on the table.
meanings.sent2: After the picnic, the crumbliest sandwich was all that remained.
meanings.sent3: The crumbliest toast always made a mess on the kitchen counter.
meanings.sent4: The crumbliest cookie crumbled into a thousand pieces when dropped.
meanings.sent5: The crumbliest pie crust was a delight to eat with its crunchy crumbs.

meanings.definition: Crumbliest: easily breaking into small pieces
meanings.sent1: The crumbliest crackers snapped in half with a gentle touch.
meanings.sent2: The crumbliest soil in the garden crumbled under my feet.
meanings.sent3: The crumbliest breadsticks were perfect for dipping in soup.
meanings.sent4: The crumbliest leaves on the tree fell at the slightest breeze.
meanings.sent5: The crumbliest chocolate bar shattered into tiny pieces when dropped.
